Text: If this is real I will not only seed but tell you how much I love you. :D  So I will be back in a minute.

this game is ok but zombie shooter 1 and 2 are better. i uploaded them both. it's the same idea but better and more weapons.

Keep saying vcomp100.dll missing even though Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable installed and file`s located in Win/sys32 dir. Could be coz it`s 64 bit OS and C++ aswell, I`m not sure. Anyways... uninstall.

Fast download, no virus, install without errors and starts the first time. However I have no audio at all in the game. Could be my drivers but I seriously doubt that.....a friend of mine is facing the same issue.

OK I have found the solution to my problem. I just needed to read the readme before commenting.
Works!!!!
